posts.title: Iceland Cruise Day 3
posts.subtitle: Celebrity cruise embarkation in Bayonne and a stormy sail away

transport.notes: Full cruise, stormy sailaway through New York Harbor

activities.description: Morning walk on Jersey City riverwalk with Starbucks breakfast
Embarkation at Bayonne cruise terminal
Stormy sailaway viewing Statue of Liberty, lower Manhattan, and Verrazano Bridge
First dinner in main dining room

posts.title: Iceland Cruise Day 4
posts.subtitle: Between NYC and Halifax, the first many sea days we'd have on this voyage

transport.notes: Dense fog all day, ship sounding horn every minute

activities.description: Sea day with dense fog conditions
Kids racing around ship and playing elevator tag

posts.title: Iceland Cruise Day 5
posts.subtitle: A cloudy day in a familiar city, with lots of family

transport.notes: Ship performed 180-degree turn to dock starboard side

activities.description: Early morning arrival in Halifax with fog, watched docking maneuver from top deck
Disembarked and walked Halifax waterfront meeting family members
Tim Hortons stop for treats
Met with Ann, Greg, Shane, Katie, Will, and Sam at the wave landmark
Sherri and Siena shopped on Spring Garden Road and visited Lululemon, met Amanda
Sherri connected with Aunts Betty, Dorothy, and Kay
Lunch onboard ship
Sailaway viewing McNab's and Georges Islands from 200 feet up
Kids attended illusionist show in main theater
Dinner in main dining room, unusually quick service

posts.title: Iceland Cruise Day 6
posts.subtitle: Sea day between Halifax and St. John's, NL

transport.to: At sea toward St. John's, Newfoundland
transport.notes: Overcast day, mid-60s temperatures, moderate winds

activities.description: Sea day with 9 hours sleep and late morning wake-up
Light breakfast and lunch with family
Reading in deck chairs

transport.notes: Perfect weather day, 75F with scattered clouds

activities.description: Hiked from ship up to Signal Hill summit via road
Visited Signal Hill fortifications, museum, and cafe
North Head Trail Loop with stairs, rocks, and cliff views
Walked back into town through colorful neighborhoods
Lunch at sushi restaurant, bento box and sushi
Returned to ship mid-afternoon to recover from hike
Watched locals wave farewell from Signal Hill during sailaway
Dinner in main dining room, daughter had two crème brûlées

posts.title: Iceland Cruise Day 8
posts.subtitle: Sea day 1 between St. John's and Greenland

transport.notes: Low 50s temps, calm seas, about 1/3 of way to Qaqortoq. Captain warned of 25-30kt winds and 6-8ft seas for next day

activities.description: First of two sea days between St. John's and Greenland
Parents dined at Tuscan Grille specialty restaurant
Kids went to main dining room 20 minutes late by themselves
Kids finally made friends at Teen Lounge and played shipwide Hide & Seek past midnight
Nice afternoon weather on western balcony, shorts weather with ship blocking wind

posts.title: Iceland Cruise Day 9
posts.subtitle: A special birthday sea day off the coast of Greenland!

transport.notes: Ship tendered outside George Town

timeline.title: Iceland Cruise Day 4
timeline.subtitle: Between NYC and Halifax, the first many sea days we'd have on this voyage

transport.notes: Dense fog all day, ship sounding horn every minute

activities.description: Sea day with dense fog conditions
Kids racing around ship and playing elevator tag

timeline.title: Iceland Cruise Day 5
timeline.subtitle: A cloudy day in a familiar city, with lots of family

transport.notes: Ship performed 180-degree turn to dock starboard side

activities.description: Early morning arrival in Halifax with fog, watched docking maneuver from top deck
Disembarked and walked Halifax waterfront meeting family members
Tim Hortons stop for treats
Met with Ann, Greg, Shane, Katie, Will, and Sam at the wave landmark
Sherri and Siena shopped on Spring Garden Road and visited Lululemon, met Amanda
Sherri connected with Aunts Betty, Dorothy, and Kay
Lunch onboard ship
Sailaway viewing McNab's and Georges Islands from 200 feet up
Kids attended illusionist show in main theater
Dinner in main dining room, unusually quick service

timeline.title: Iceland Cruise Day 6
timeline.subtitle: Sea day between Halifax and St. John's, NL

transport.to: At sea toward St. John's, Newfoundland
transport.notes: Overcast day, mid-60s temperatures, moderate winds

activities.description: Sea day with 9 hours sleep and late morning wake-up
Light breakfast and lunch with family
Reading in deck chairs

transport.notes: Perfect weather day, 75F with scattered clouds

activities.description: Hiked from ship up to Signal Hill summit via road
Visited Signal Hill fortifications, museum, and cafe
North Head Trail Loop with stairs, rocks, and cliff views
Walked back into town through colorful neighborhoods
Lunch at sushi restaurant, bento box and sushi
Returned to ship mid-afternoon to recover from hike
Watched locals wave farewell from Signal Hill during sailaway
Dinner in main dining room, daughter had two crème brûlées

timeline.title: Iceland Cruise Day 8
timeline.subtitle: Sea day 1 between St. John's and Greenland

transport.notes: Low 50s temps, calm seas, about 1/3 of way to Qaqortoq. Captain warned of 25-30kt winds and 6-8ft seas for next day

activities.description: First of two sea days between St. John's and Greenland
Parents dined at Tuscan Grille specialty restaurant
Kids went to main dining room 20 minutes late by themselves
Kids finally made friends at Teen Lounge and played shipwide Hide & Seek past midnight
Nice afternoon weather on western balcony, shorts weather with ship blocking wind

timeline.title: Iceland Cruise Day 9
timeline.subtitle: A special birthday sea day off the coast of Greenland!
